# R² AI

> Production-grade AI agents for sales intelligence and revenue operations. We build working systems, not slideware. Deployed in 6-8 weeks.

R² AI (R Squared AI, Inc.) is an AI consulting and engineering firm that builds and deploys production-grade AI agents for revenue teams. Founded by operators — not consultants — who have carried quota, architected enterprise systems at Fortune 500 scale, and deployed AI agents running production workloads.

## What We Build

- [Homepage](https://rsquaredai.com): Overview of R² AI's sales intelligence platform and AI agent capabilities
- [Contact / Book a Demo](https://form.typeform.com/to/XPforiEB): Schedule a 30-minute consultation

## Core Services

### Expansion & Cross-Sell Intelligence
AI agents analyze usage patterns, contract timelines, and engagement signals to surface 15-30% more pipeline from existing customers.

### Pipeline Intelligence
Real-time deal health scoring powered by conversation analysis, engagement tracking, and win/loss patterns. Alerts before opportunities disappear.

### Sales Enablement & CRM Automation
Automatic call logging, contact updates, and activity capture. Reps sell. AI does the CRM hygiene.

### Audit-Ready AI Compliance
Full audit trails on every AI action. Explainable decisions. No black boxes. Regulatory ready.

### Stack Enhancement
Intelligence layer on top of Salesforce, Dynamics, HubSpot, ERP, email, and conversation platforms. No migrations. No rip-and-replace.

## Industries Served

- **Private Equity**: Fast operational wins for portfolio companies
- **Insurance**: Producer enablement and policy intelligence
- **Manufacturing**: Long-cycle tracking and complex product management

## Founders

- **Rich Rivara, CEO**: 20+ years scaling revenue ops at enterprise tech companies. Former executive at Appirio (acquired for $500M) and BridgeNext. Built sales orgs from $0 to 8-figure ARR. [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rich-rivara-388ba82/)
- **Will Godfrey, CTO**: Former McKinsey technologist. Architected enterprise systems for Fortune 500 ($500M-$1B+ revenue). Led Google Workspace rollout for City of Boston (30,000+ users). [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/willgodfrey/)
- **Tyler Preisser, CPO**: AI-native product leader. Former VP of Operations who automated entire back office using agentic AI — production systems processing thousands of workflows daily. [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tyler-preisser-803605233/)

## Key Differentiators

- Builders, not advisors — we deploy working AI agents, not slideware
- 6-8 week deployment timeline from discovery to production
- Founding team has carried quota and built enterprise systems
- Enterprise-grade security with full audit trails
- No rip-and-replace — we enhance your existing tech stack
